khanija thel sansthawata thel pompa karana nala matha anawasarayen padinchi wuwan idiri masa haya athulatha iwath kirimata siyalu katayuthu sudanam bawa khanija thel sanwardhana amathyanshaya pawasayi.wasara 40kata wada parani me thel nala matha anawasarayen padinchiwuwan iwath kirimata adhikarana thinduwak labi thibe.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage upades matha khanija thel sanwardhana amathi susil premajayantha mahathage madihathwima nisa ema anawasara padinchikaruwanta sahana labadimata sansthawa sudanam bawath khanija thel karmantha sanwardhana niyojya amathi sarana gunawardhana mahatha dinaminata pawasiya.me thel nala wasara 40kata wada kalayak aluthwadiya nokirima hethuwen arbuda rasakata muhuna di athi bawa pawasu niyojya amathiwaraya thel nalayak pupura giyahoth wishala jiwitha awadanamak menma rata pura gamanagamanaya adala wimakda athiwiya haki bawa awadharanaya keleya.  .
